ygData.subject: Re: red peoples
ygData.msgSnippet: i like pvp, but just on the pvp servers. I dont like the fact that you have to be pvp to heal another pvp, that is kind of stupid. ... From: Joe Weaver
ygData.messageBody:
i like pvp, but just on the pvp servers. I dont like the fact that you have
to be pvp to heal another pvp, that is kind of stupid.

-----Original Message-----
From: Joe Weaver <easttuth@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 09, 1999 1:08 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: red peoples


>From: Joe Weaver <easttuth@...>
>
>How did you know who to give the book to if you didn't read it? Also, there
is a way to switch from Red to Green, you just have to find that one out tho
;)
>
>enigma wrote:
>
>> From: enigma <enigma@...>
>>
>> Do you all agree with the red pvp stuff? i dont, when i was just starting
i gave the book to the priest *before i knew how to read it because wheni
played the demo i couldn't figure it out either* and am red, and as of last
night i found out another thing that will suck in the future, and i dont
want to start another character because im already a level 9 necromancer,
noone can cure diseases or heal me unless they are red too... this seems
like overkill to me and verant needs to change some things.
>>
>> Naelie
>>
>> Download Neoplanet at http://www.neoplanet.com
